info.description:
Features
========

-  Asynchronous downloading using aiohttp
-  All downloads cached locally in sqlite
-  Continue an interrupted crawl



Example
=======

.. sourcecode:: python

    >>> import ws
    ...



Install
=======

Install from pypi:

.. sourcecode:: bash

    pip install ws

Or checkout latest version from repository:

.. sourcecode:: bash

    hg clone https://bitbucket.org/richardpenman/ws
info.name: ws
